titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to extend the Federal carjacking offense to cases not involving firearms, and to authorize the imposition of the death penalty if a death results from the commission of that offense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 5/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.
